sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: More than 1,000 people have been killed after a powerful earthquake struck in Morocco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The death toll is expected to climb as rescue operations continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi hails the G20 leaders' declaration, which stops short of condemning Russia for the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The death toll from heavy flooding in Greece and Spain continues to rise as police and rescue services find more bodies swept away by the rain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The death toll from a rare and powerful earthquake which struck Morocco late on Friday night has passed 1,000 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Morocco's government added that over 1,200 were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Buildings from villages in the Atlas Mountains to the historic city of Marrakesh were damaged in the quake.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Casualty figures were expected to climb as the search continues and as rescuers reach remote areas. The entire world, the communities, are with Morocco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And we are ready to help them in every possible way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Several countries have already announced that they are ready to send assistance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Moroccan media reported that the 12th century Koutoubia Mosque in Marrakech, one of the city's most famed landmarks, suffered damage but the extent was not immediately clear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Indian Prime Minister and G20 host Narendra Modi announced a consensus had been reached on its leaders' declaration on the first day of talks in New Delhi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The declaration stopped short of condemning Russia for the war in Ukraine but did warn states against seizing territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The African Union was granted permanent member status in the G20, with Modi saying it turned the grouping into a people's G20.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: US President Biden, EU chief von der Leyen and Modi unveiled a rail and shipping project linking India to the Middle East and Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is nothing but historic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It will be the most direct connection to date between India, the Arabian Gulf and Europe with a rail link that will make trade between India and Europe 40% faster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The corridor would help to boost trade, transport energy resources and improve digital connectivity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The project aims to serve as a counterpoint to China's Belt and Road Initiative, also known as the New Silk Road.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The death toll from severe flooding in central Greece has risen to 10 people, while another four remain missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Η πλήρη Ελλάδα έχει στρατεύει σε 10 άτομα, ενώ άλλες 4 μείνουν αφιερωμένα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Οι σκοπιές σκοπιών και τα μηχανήματα έχουν αφαιρεθεί σε χιλιάδες άτομα από τα αυτο, όλα τα χωριά γύρω από τον Παλαμά είναι αποκλεισμένα, σε ύψους της σκεπής.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Τη δακραβία βοήθειας, τεράστιες ζημιές υλικές, πολύ πιθανόν και ζωές χαμένες. High streams have been found, raising the total number of deaths to seven. The son of one of the men was rescued after spending the night clinging to a tree.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: British police have confirmed that an ex-soldier who escaped from prison on Wednesday morning while awaiting trial on terrorism charges was later spotted walking away from a busy roundabout in South London just three minutes' drive from the jail.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Metropolitan Police's counter-terror commander says the inmate managed to flee the prison's kitchen strapped to the bottom of a delivery lorry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Authorities are offering up to £22,000 for information that directly leads to the arrest and capture of the 21-year-old fugitive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Neymar eclipsed Pelé as the top goalscorer for Brazil's national team after overtaking the three-time World Cup winners' career total on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The president of the Brazilian FA paid tribute by handing him a plaque before he celebrated with his teammates. O presidente do F.A. brasileiro pagou tribuna entregando-lhe uma placa antes de celebrar com seus parceiros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: and today I did it.
